ovdesc.p: This application allows a user to compare the holdings of a particular portfolio against the model defined for that portfolio. It is keyed on Account Officer and allows the Account Officer to compare the holdings of a single portfolio against the model defined on POLICY.PARAMETER which will specify where the portfolio's investments should be.

Data can be input into the SC.PORT.COMPARE record using the Input or Verify functions. If the Verify function is used the record will produce an enquiry (Using ENQUIRY record SC.PORT.COMPARE) showing the portfolio's holdings against its associated model. If the SC.PORT.COMPARE application is being run under DeskTop then this enquiry can be produced by typing YES in the RUN.ENQUIRY field, if it is being run under classic T24 then the Enquiry will be produced on depressing <F5>.
Note; the Enquiry will only be produced if SC.PORT.COMPARE is being run with the Verify Function.

If the portfolio model is defined at Security level (see POLICY.PARAMETER for more details about setting up portfolio models) then the user will be prompted whether they wish to generate security orders to bring the portfolio holding back into line with its model. This will happen when they leave the record (press F1). If there are variance between the model and portfolio then any orders produced will be written to the SC.PORT.ORDER application.

This field denotes a period of time that defines the start of a maturity band and is normally used in conjunction with the field MAT.END . In practise, the remaining life to maturity (in days) for the bond is calculated using the maturity date on the SECURITY.MASTER file. The result is then applied to the maturity band to determine whether or not the bond falls into this band. This field is used for Portfolio modelling and reporting/enquiry purposes.
Example :

16.1.1 MAT.START 0D (greater than/equal to 0 days) 17.1.1 MAT.END 6M (less than 6 months) 16.1.2 MAT.START 6M (greater than/equal to 6 months) 17.1.2 MAT.END 1Y (less than 1 year) 16.1.3 MAT.START 1Y (greater than/equal to 1 year) 17.1.3 MAT.END 3Y (less than 3 years) 16.1.4 MAT.START 3Y (greater than/equal to 3 years) 17.1.4 MAT.END 10Y (less than 10 years) 16.1.5 MAT.START 10Y (greater than/equal to 10 years) 17.1.5 MAT.END (as above i.e. infinity)
Optional Input
If the field is not entered portfolio modelling processing will not group bonds by maturity band
If this field is populated, bonds will be grouped by maturity bands for modelling and reporting purposes.
